title: WTB:  T-206 Shag Shaughnessy (SGC or PSA)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB:  T-206 Shag Shaughnessy (SGC or PSA)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
I'm looking to purchase a T-206 Shag Shaughnessy graded by PSA or SGC with any back (Hindu, Piedmont, Old Mill).  I would love to acquire one with a Hindu back.

I'm looking for lower grade examples (PSA 1-4, SGC 10-50) with good eye appeal.  Email me at: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com, with what you have (scans and your asking price).  I will respond in a timely manner.

Thank you in advance.

Eric,I saw on e-bay I believe it is a PSA4 as a BIN. It might be a little overpriced but maybe you could work something out. CN

Thanks Chris.  I saw that one, and actually tried to work something out but was unsuccessful.  It has a really nice front, but it also has that spot of paper loss on the back.  SGC would knock that down to a 20 or 30.  If I'm going to pay that much for a Shag, it's gotta be flawless for the grade, and that one just isn't.
